text: There are few movies that I absolutely adore but, if I had to name one, I ’ d have to say that “ Dirty Dancing ”, 1987 with Patrick Swayze and Jennifer Grey has to be my all time favourite. Having watched the movie several dozen times, I know the lines before they are said and often quote them during opportunistic moments to be comical. For those of you who know the movie, I ’ m sure that you have the same question that most of us were left with … “ What happened after that final night at Kellerman ’ s? Did Baby and Johnny stay together or did they go their own separate ways? ” While it could have gone either way, I think the majority of us wanted to believe that Baby and Johnny did continue on after that and ended up happily wed with babes
